name: Manan Alwadhi
college: Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, University of Delhi

full_output.summary: Hi there! My name is Manan Alwadhi. I am currently 18 years old and pursuing a Bachelors in Economics from Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, University of Delhi. With a strong foundation from Bal Bharati Public School, Pitampura, where I served as the Vice President of International Dimensions in Schools (IDS) in the student council, I have developed exceptional leadership and organizational skills. Through my experiences, I have honed my abilities to coordinate and organize inter-school and intra-school competitions, showcasing my attention to detail and project management expertise. I have always strived towards continuous self-development and to become a better individual by conquering my weaknesses and adopting a positive attitude towards life.

education.school: Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, University of Delhi
education.degree: Bachelor of Arts - BA in Economics

education.school: Bal Bharati Public School at Pitampura
Bal Bharati Public School at Pitampura

experiences.description: I have researched and included a detailed list of potential sponsors that align with the aims and target audience of our event. I also regularly communicated with sponsors to ensure their needs and expectations were met Further, I managed to convert sponsorship deals worth of 26k+ INR for my team.

experiences.company_name: Career Counselling and Guidance Cell, Shaheed Bhagat Singh College
experiences.description: As a Marketing member of the society, I have to assist the team in researching and exploring different career options, industries, and professions, as well as providing information about educational and training requirements for various career paths through blog posts, social media content and visual materials.

experiences.company_name: Ecospire, Economics Society, Shaheed Bhagat Singh College
experiences.description: My role as the Research and Development member is multifaceted, involving research, policy analysis, collaboration, education and a commitment to advancing the understanding of economic phenomena for the benefit of the society.

I was elected as the vice president for the International Dimensions at School where our role was to spread awareness about global issues through organizing multiple debates, public speaking competitions for students and helping in various other events held at the school.

Being a part of Interact, I was involved in multiple clothes and book drives during the festive season. Moreover, as an operations specialist for the club, I was also responsible for conducting workshops for elementary students to sensitize the young generations about significant topics such as waste segregation and ragpicking. It was soon followed by poster-making and essay competitions specially organised for them, which saw enthusiastic participation.

full_output.name: Manan Alwadhi
achievements_and_awards: 2nd Runner up - Ecoprayog - Econvista 2024 Economics department, Lady Shri Ram College for Women April 2024 Secured Third position in Ecoprayog, organised by Economics department, Lady Shri Ram College for women which involved the need develop and present innovative solutions to contemporary economic issues, ultimately formulating effective policy recommendations.

Social Media Influencer - Silver Award Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, University of Delhi May 2024 I had received an award in the Silver Category in the Social Media Influencer Awards 2024, organised by Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, University of Delhi for my active participation on LinkedIn.

Winner - Convergence - Econuence 2023 The Economics Society, Kirori Mal College December 2023 Emerged as the winner in the Policy Conclave round of Econuence, which was structured around the use of core macroeconomic principles to solve the hypothetical crisis and present the solution.

Special Mention Award for Top 10% Best Essays Nationwide for YFS GCP India Selections for 2022-23 Youth Forum Switzerland November 2022 I was awarded a special mention award at the national level by Youth Forum Switzerland for my excellent, in-depth analysis of the impact of SDG goals in my region during the India Selection Round of Youth Forum Switzerland: Global Changemakers Project.

2nd Runner up - Vanguard - Blisspoint 2024 Economics Association, Sri Venkateshwara College April 2024 I received third position in Vanguard, organised by Economics Association, Sri Venkateshwara College. The format was a roundtable crisis committee competition which revolved around dynamic role-playing and strategic discussions aimed at resolving the given economic crisis.

degree: Bachelor of Arts - BA in Economics
